abstract: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un, in speech to his Workers' Party, says country will abide by commitment to nuclear nonproliferation but will maintain nuclear arsenal as deterrent against threat from United States; nuclear weapons program has served as platform for Kim to solidify his grip on power.
lead_paragraph: Kim Jong-un says Pyongyang would only resort to using its cache of atomic weapons if its national sovereignty were breached or threatened.

headline.main: North Korea Claims Its Nuclear Arsenal Is Just a ‘Deterrent’
headline.print_headline: Nuclear Arsenal a ‘Deterrent,’ North Korea Says

snippet: Kim Jong-un says Pyongyang would only resort to using its cache of atomic weapons if its national sovereignty were breached or threatened.

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
keywords.name: subject
